title: Nursing Education for Infants with Congenital Heart Disease: Comparative Analysis of E-Learning and Classroom Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing skills and understanding of the cardiovascular system
context.additional_context: For Learners in Managerial/Leadership Roles: Emphasis on Practical Content Applicable to Workplace Contexts

learning_goals: Explain physiological characteristics and nursing intervention strategies for infants with congenital heart disease
Evaluate effective educational strategies by comparing the advantages and disadvantages of e-learning and in-person classroom instruction
Develop comprehensive nursing care plans for infants with congenital heart disease based on real-world cases
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
